disableParam_NT.Wiki: Parameters marked with are excluded in the NT version package.

ReverbType.Wiki: Specifies the reverb type to apply during the cutscene

BgmBehaviorTypeOnStart.Wiki: Specifies normal BGM behavior at the start of cutscenes

OneShotBgmBehaviorOnStart.AltName: One-shot BGM Behavior Type On Start
OneShotBgmBehaviorOnStart.Wiki: Specifies the one-shot BGM behavior at the start of the cutscene

PostPlaySeId.Wiki: SEID (category: p) specification to post at the end of the cutscene (-1: do not post)

PostPlaySeIdForSkip.AltName: Post Play SE ID for Skip
PostPlaySeIdForSkip.Wiki: SEID_ for skipping to post at the end of the cutscene (category: p) specified (-1: not posted)

EnterMapMuteStopTimeOnDrawCutscene.AltName: Enter Map Mute Stop Time on Draw Cutscene
EnterMapMuteStopTimeOnDrawCutscene.Wiki: Cutscene drawing time to unmute immediately after entering [seconds] (less than 0: not canceled in drawing time)
